info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 20 at 3:16AM HST until December 20 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR PORTIONS OF THE BIG ISLAND THROUGH 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS THROUGH 6 AM HST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY FOR NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI LANAI KAHOOLAWE AND MAUI THROUGH 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with localized gusts over 45 mph. * WHERE...Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Molokai and Lanai. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, knock down tree branches, blow away tents and awnings and make it difficult to drive, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.
